math.alttext: e^{\pm}(u)\equiv\pm\sum_{\begin{array}[]{c}{\scriptstyle k\geq 0}\\ {\scriptstyle k<0}\\ \end{array}}e_{k}u^{-k-1}\,,\qquad f^{\pm}(u)\equiv\pm\sum_{\begin{array}[]{c}% {\scriptstyle k\geq 0}\\ {\scriptstyle k<0}\\ \end{array}}f_{k}u^{-k-1}\,,\qquad h^{\pm}(u)\equiv 1\pm\sum_{\begin{array}[]{% c}{\scriptstyle k\geq 0}\\ {\scriptstyle k<0}\\ \end{array}}h_{k}u^{-k-1}\,.

R_{V8}(\beta,r)=\rho_{r}(\beta)\left(\begin{array}[]{cccc}\displaystyle\frac{% \cos\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\cos\frac{\pi}{2r}}{\cos\frac{\pi+i\beta}{2r}}&0&0&% \displaystyle-\frac{\sin\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\sin\frac{\pi}{2r}}{\cos\frac{\pi+i% \beta}{2r}}\\ 0&\displaystyle\frac{\sin\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\cos\frac{\pi}{2r}}{\sin\frac{\pi+% i\beta}{2r}}&\displaystyle\frac{\cos\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\sin\frac{\pi}{2r}}{% \sin\frac{\pi+i\beta}{2r}}&0\\ 0&\displaystyle\frac{\cos\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\sin\frac{\pi}{2r}}{\sin\frac{\pi+% i\beta}{2r}}&\displaystyle\frac{\sin\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\cos\frac{\pi}{2r}}{% \sin\frac{\pi+i\beta}{2r}}&0\\ \displaystyle-\frac{\sin\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\sin\frac{\pi}{2r}}{\cos\frac{\pi+i% \beta}{2r}}&0&0&\displaystyle\frac{\cos\frac{i\beta}{2r}\;\cos\frac{\pi}{2r}}{% \cos\frac{\pi+i\beta}{2r}}\\ \end{array}\right)\;.

K^{(6)}(\beta_{1},\beta_{2})=V^{\prime}(\beta_{1})\otimes V^{\prime}(\beta_{2}% )\qquad\mbox{with}\qquad V^{\prime}(\beta)=\left(\begin{array}[]{rr}e^{\frac{% \beta}{2r}}&0\\ 0&e^{-\frac{\beta}{2r}}\\ \end{array}\right)\;.

italic-V POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-beta CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-pi POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-beta POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-g POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) PUNCT:,
V^{\prime}(\beta)=\pi_{\beta}\left(g^{\prime}\right)\;,

italic-g POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end RELOP:equals OPFUNCTION:exponential OPEN:( FRACOP:italic-divide ARG:start italic-h POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:1 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end ARG:end ARG:start NUMBER:2 italic-r ARG:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
g^{\prime}=\exp\left(\frac{h_{1}}{2r}\right)\;.

caligraphic-K POSTSUBSCRIPT:start NUMBER:12 POSTSUBSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-r CLOSE:) RELOP:equals italic-g POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-r CLOSE:) MULOP:tensor-product italic-g POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-r ADDOP:plus italic-c POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start OPEN:( NUMBER:1 CLOSE:) POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) Delta POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start caligraphic-F POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end OPEN:( italic-g POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start SUPOP:prime POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end POSTSUPERSCRIPT:start ADDOP:minus NUMBER:1 POSTSUPERSCRIPT:end CLOSE:) PERIOD:.
{\cal K}_{12}(r)=g^{\prime}(r)\otimes g^{\prime}(r+c^{(1)})\;\Delta^{\cal F}({% g^{\prime}}^{-1})\;.

math.alttext: {\cal K}_{12}(r)\;(\Delta^{\cal F}\otimes\mbox{id}){\cal K}(r)={\cal K}_{23}(r% +c^{(1)})\;(\mbox{id}\otimes\Delta^{{\cal F}^{\prime}}){\cal K}(r)\;,
